mainPackage
Class GateController

java.lang.Object
  mainPackage.GateController

public class GateController
extends java.lang.Object

the gate controller handels the communication with gate and with metamap, over a plug-in for gate, it instanciates the necessary objects of gate, configures it, annotates input documents, executes them with gate and metamap and holds an instance of the condition-translater, which translates gate-documents into logic conditions

Author:
Christian Hinterer

Method Detail

InitGateComponents

public void InitGateComponents()
initializes the gate framework, gate embedded, the gate ANNIE, the metamap plug-in and the number tagger

ParseFileForConditionExpressionStatements

public java.util.Collection<ConditionExpression> ParseFileForConditionExpressionStatements(java.lang.String fileName)
calls the method for finding CoditionExpression-tags in the input file and logs count of findings

Parameters:
fileName - file name of the input file
Returns:
list of conditionExpression that contain the plain-text phrase of the condition-tag and the id

ProcessConditionExpressionStatements

public java.util.Collection<ConditionBase> ProcessConditionExpressionStatements(java.util.Collection<ConditionExpression> conditionExpressions)
                                                                         throws java.net.ConnectException
processes the plain-text condition phrases with gate and metaMap. This creates annotations on the condition phrases and calls the method to translate the annotated condition phrases into logic conditions

Parameters:
conditionExpressions - the list of plain-text conditions to be processed with gate
Returns:
a list of classes that contain the found logic conditions
Throws:
java.net.ConnectException - ConnectException: unable to establish connection

FindAndProcessConditionExpressionStatements

public java.util.Collection<ConditionBase> FindAndProcessConditionExpressionStatements(java.lang.String fileName)
combines the find- and the process-method with the background of offering one single method call for external components

Parameters:
fileName - file name of the input file
Returns:
list of classes that contain the found conditions

gateAppFile - gate application file
